channel.title: Script loading help
channel.description:
I'm trying to make my bot scriptable and I've made my own classloader to load the script classes with.
Do I have to pass the rs2applet and an EventManager(Where the script can add Listeners) as parameters to script or are the better ways?
This is what I'm currently thinking of: [code]public Script(Applet targetApplet, EventManager eventManager) { ... }[/code] And is the possibly something else that I should send to the script when loading it?
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Script loading help
item.dc:creator: @antti_mies antti mies
item.description:
@antti_mies wrote:

I’m trying to make my bot scriptable and I’ve made my own classloader to load the script classes with.

Do I have to pass the rs2applet and an EventManager(Where the script can add Listeners) as parameters to script or are the better ways?

This is what I’m currently thinking of:

public Script(Applet targetApplet, EventManager eventManager) { ... }
And is the possibly something else that I should send to the script when loading it?

Thanks in advance.
